data.persona: I live near the docks on the edge of the city.  I steal food from cargo boxes that are loaded into ships at night.  Sometimes rats from strange lands come off ships that come to the dock.
data.description:
You are in the Bat room.
It is cold, dark and filled with bats. it is humid and there are some paddles on the ground.
There's a paddle and a rock here.
The bat king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must attack the bat king
data.mid_motivation: I need to hurt the bat king to avenge my sister's death
data.long_motivation: I want to ensure that the bats never attack the rats again and wish to return with an army
